page.title: 04Bawtry Dramatic Society
page.content: There is a membership of 40 adults and 35 juniors.The later meet each Friday evening and enjoy play reading, improvisation, breathing exercises etc. They take part in productions and produce their own show for parents and members. Three major productions are presented each year,each for seven performances. Two are usually full length plays and the third a play for children.(Recent productions have been Blithe Spirit by Noel Coward, Table Manners by Alan Ayckborne and Pinocchio). In addition the Christmas and Summer shows are performed for just 2 nights and contain a miscellany of music and words. The Society also has an ongoing fund raising campaign and tries to use the theatre as much as possible to enable it to be self supporting and maintain the fabric of the theatre.
